alert.note: Alert for Bent (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 06 at 12:51PM MDT until July 07 at 10:48AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Colorado... Purgatoire River Near Las Animas affecting Bent County. For the Purgatoire River...including Las Animas...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Purgatoire River Near Las Animas. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Minor Flood. Minor agricultural flooding occurs into low lying areas along the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:15 PM MDT Thursday the stage was 10.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 12:15 PM MDT Thursday was 10.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is nearing its crest. It will then fall below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening around 700 PM MDT.
